analysis.description:
AnkhTokenSender.bulkTransfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#271-283) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_receivers[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#282)

AnkhTokenSender.bulkTransferFrom (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#283-300) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(_from,_receivers[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#297-298)

AnkhTokenSender.transferTokensToOwner (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#300-310) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#304-310)

AnkhTokenSender.bulkTransfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_receivers[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#282)

AnkhTokenSender.bulkTransferFrom has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(_from,_receivers[i],_amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/26/0x471407f224b99bb3347de2609bc117dad367f889.sol#297-298)
